channel.title: Making fun pk i need help
channel.description:
// If killed apply dead if ((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <= YYYY && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) { IsDead = false; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); currentHealth = playerLevel[3]; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; refreshSkills(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("you have died at fun pk :)"); }
i have that but i dont understand what the
if ((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <= YYYY && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
please someone help add me on msn or come on teh server to get teh coords of where i want it to be msn=tom_killer@hotmail.co.uk server ip = project-2k9.no-ip.biz -or- i-like-pk-sex.no-ip.biz

item.title: Making fun pk i need help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

That > and < crap is pretty repetitive, especially in the nonWild method. You should make a method for that.

private final boolean isWithin(int minX, int maxX, int minY, int maxY)
{
    return absX >= minX && absX <= maxX && absY >= minY && absY <= maxY;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Making fun pk i need help

item.title: Making fun pk i need help
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55
item.description:
@D_T_55 wrote:

That’s where the nonwild(safe zone) is i believe…mines a lot shorter than that though…

if ((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <= YYYY && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
